alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 5:56AM AKST until January 28 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility and very cold wind chills expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 inches from this afternoon through Sunday. North winds to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Very cold wind chills to 50 below. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 3 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. Wind chills to 50 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...North winds will increase today with winds gusting to 40 mph tonight through Sunday. Wind chills will drop to 50 below this afternoon and continue into Sunday. Snow developing this afternoon will continue into Sunday. Blowing snow with low visibility will develop tonight. The worst conditions will be south of Trims Camp.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp
